channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Social Slider Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Social Slider Widget

item.title: CVE-2021-24196|2024-08-03T19:21:18.781Z -- unknown -- social%20slider%20widget
item.description: The Social Slider Widget WordPress plugin before 1.8.5 allowed Authenticated Reflected XSS in the plugin settings page as the ‘token_error’ parameter can be controlled by users and it is directly echoed without being sanitized
